newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Spector scrips to be offered Friday.
newsitem.headline: Spector scrips to be offered Friday.

text.p: Banque Paribas Belgium said on Tuesday 342,164 number five coupons attached to the shares in Belgian film finisher Spector Photo Group NV would be offered for sale as scrips on the Brussels bourse from Friday.
The holder of nine coupons will have the right to buy four new shares with the VVPR tax reduction strip in Spector at a price of 1,865 Belgian francs each.
The offer follows the subscription to 1,475,977 Spector shares with VVPR strip by preferential holders during the subscription period that ended on October 21.
Holders of scrips can subscribe to the remaining 152,073 shares between October 28 and 31.
The capital increase is to pay for recent acquisitions in Germany, France, Hungary, Switzerland and Belgium.
The issue price compares with a closing share price of 1,990 on the Brussels bourse on Tuesday.
